verbs.description: conservate (third-person singular simple present conservates, present participle conservating, simple past and past participle conservated)

examples: The theory which was, and we believe is still maintained by the patentees, embraces the idea that the vitality of the animal is thus conservated and eventually conveyed to the plant per the Native Guano.
I'm sorry, but if it's fun in any way it's not environmentalism.  [â€¦]  Let's conservate.
